key.name: dock-position
key.description: Dock is shown on the Left, Right, Top or Bottom side of the screen.

key.name: animation-time
key.description: Sets the time duration of the autohide effect.

key.name: show-delay
key.description: Sets the delay after the mouse reaches the screen border before showing the dock.

key.name: hide-delay
key.description: Sets the delay after the mouse left the dock before hiding it.

key.name: custom-background-color
key.summary: Set a custom dash background background color
key.description: Sets the color for the dash background.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Customize the background color of the dash.

key.name: transparency-mode
key.description: FIXED: constant transparency. DYNAMIC: dock takes the opaque style only when windows are close to it.

key.name: running-indicator-style
key.description: DEFAULT: .... DOTS: ....

key.name: running-indicator-dominant-color
key.summary: Use application icon dominant color for the indicator color

key.name: customize-alphas
key.summary: Manually set the min and max opacity
key.description: For the dynamic mode, the min/max opacity values will be given by 'min-alpha' and 'max-alpha'.

key.name: min-alpha
key.summary: Opacity of the dash background when free-floating
key.description: Sets the opacity of the dash background when no windows are close.

key.name: max-alpha
key.summary: Opacity of the dash background when windows are close.
key.description: Sets the opacity of the dash background when windows are close.

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity of the dash background when in autohide mode.

key.name: intellihide
key.description: Enable or disable intellihide mode

key.name: intellihide-mode
key.summary: Define which windows are considered for intellihide.

key.name: autohide
key.description: Enable or disable autohide mode

key.name: require-pressure-to-show
key.description: Enable or disable requiring pressure to show the dash

key.name: pressure-threshold
key.description: Sets how much pressure is needed to show the dash.

key.name: autohide-in-fullscreen
key.description: Enable autohide in fullscreen mode.

key.name: dock-fixed
key.description: Dock is always visible

key.name: scroll-switch-workspace
key.summary: Switch workspace by scrolling over the dock
key.description: Add the possibility to switch workspace by mouse scrolling over the dock.

key.name: dash-max-icon-size
key.description: Set the allowed maximum dash icon size. Allowed range: 16..64.

key.name: icon-size-fixed
key.description: Keep the icon size fived by scrolling the dock.

key.name: apply-custom-theme
key.description: Apply customization to the dash appearance

key.name: custom-theme-shrink
key.description: TODO

key.name: custom-theme-customize-running-dots
key.summary: Customize the style of the running application indicators.
key.description: Customize the style of the running application indicators.

key.name: custom-theme-running-dots-color
key.description: Customize the color of the running application indicators.

key.name: custom-theme-running-dots-border-color
key.description: Customize the border color of the running application indicators.

key.name: custom-theme-running-dots-border-width
key.description: Customize the border width of the running application indicators.

key.name: show-running
key.description: Show or hide running applications icons in the dash

key.name: isolate-workspaces
key.description: Dash shows only windows from the currentworkspace

key.name: isolate-monitors
key.description: Dash shows only windows from the monitor

key.name: show-windows-preview
key.summary: Show preview of the open windows
key.description: Replace open windows list with windows previews

key.name: show-favorites
key.description: Show or hide favorite applications icons in the dash

key.name: show-trash
key.description: Show or hide the trash can icon in the dash

key.name: show-mounts
key.description: Show or hide mounted volume and device icons in the dash

key.name: show-show-apps-button
key.description: Show applications button in the dash

key.name: show-apps-at-top
key.summary: Show application button on the left
key.description: Show application button on the left of the dash

key.name: animate-show-apps
key.summary: Animate Show Applications from the desktop
key.description: Animate Show Applications from the desktop

key.name: bolt-support
key.description: Make the extension work properly when bolt extensions is enabled

key.name: height-fraction
key.summary: Dock max height (fraction of available space)

key.name: extend-height
key.summary: Extend the dock container to all the available height

key.name: preferred-monitor
key.summary: Monitor on which putting the dock
key.description: Set on which monitor to put the dock, use -1 for the primary one

key.name: multi-monitor
key.description: Show a dock on every monitor

key.name: click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: scroll-action
key.description: Set the action that is executed when scrolling on the application icon

key.name: shift-click-action
key.summary: Action when shift+clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when shift+clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: middle-click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when middle-clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: shift-middle-click-action
key.summary: Action when clicking on a running app
key.description: Set the action that is executed when shift+middle-clicking on the icon of a running application

key.name: hot-keys
key.description: Launch and switch between dash items using Super+(0-9)

key.name: hotkeys-show-dock
key.summary: Show the dock when using the hotkeys
key.description: The dock will be quickly shown so that the number-overlay is visible and app activation is easier

key.name: shortcut-text
key.summary: Keybinding to show the dock and the number overlay.
key.description: Behavior depends on hotkeys-show-dock and hotkeys-overlay.

key.name: shortcut
key.summary: Keybinding to show the dock and the number overlay.
key.description: Behavior depends on hotkeys-show-dock and hotkeys-overlay.

key.name: shortcut-timeout
key.description: Sets the time duration before the dock is hidden again.

key.name: hotkeys-overlay
key.summary: Show the dock when using the hotkeys
key.description: The dock will be quickly shown so that the number-overlay is visible and app activation is easier

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-1
key.description: Keybinding to launch 1st app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-2
key.description: Keybinding to launch 2nd app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-3
key.description: Keybinding to launch 3rd app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-4
key.description: Keybinding to launch 4th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-5
key.description: Keybinding to launch 5th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-6
key.description: Keybinding to launch 6th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-7
key.description: Keybinding to launch 7th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-8
key.description: Keybinding to launch 8th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-9
key.description: Keybinding to launch 9th app.

key.name: app-ctrl-hotkey-10
key.description: Keybinding to launch 10th app.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-1
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 1st dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 1st app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-2
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 2nd dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 2nd app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-3
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 3rd dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 3rd app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-4
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 4th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 4th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-5
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 5th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 5th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-6
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 6th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 6th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-7
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 7th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 7th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-8
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 8th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 8th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-9
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 9th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 9th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-shift-hotkey-10
key.summary: Keybinding to trigger 10th dash app with shift behavior
key.description: Keybinding to trigger 10th app with shift behavior.

key.name: app-hotkey-1
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 1st application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-2
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 2nd application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-3
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 3rd application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-4
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 4th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-5
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 5th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-6
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 6th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-7
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 7th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-8
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 8th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-9
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 9th application in the dash.

key.name: app-hotkey-10
key.description: Keybinding to either show or launch the 10th application in the dash.

key.name: force-straight-corner
key.description: Make the borders in the dash non rounded

key.name: unity-backlit-items
key.summary: Enable unity7 like glossy backlit items
key.description: Emulate the unity7 backlit glossy items behaviour
